titleStmt.title: Flagellum, or, The life and death, birth and burial of Oliver Cromwel faithfully described in an exact account of his policies and successes, not heretofore published or discovered / by S.T., Gent.
titleStmt.author: Heath, James, 1629-1664.

notesStmt.note: S.T., gent. is a pseudonym for James Heath. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
